quote-section.text: Your donation helps preserve the history of the Holocaust and educate future generations. Together, we can ensure that the lessons of the past are never forgotten.

thank-you.title: Thank you!
thank-you.message: Your contribution helps preserve the stories of those who can no longer speak. Thank you for supporting our mission to ensure history is never forgotten.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.intro:
Giving should be simple and meaningful. As part of Sweden’s national museum network, we are committed to full transparency, accountability, and ensuring your support creates lasting impact.

While we do not yet offer credit card payments, donating is still easy and secure. You can support us through direct bank transfers or via Swish, Sweden’s popular mobile payment service.

Your contribution helps preserve the memory of the Holocaust, support our exhibitions, educational programs, and the ongoing collection of testimonies and artifacts. Together, we ensure these vital stories continue to educate and inspire future generations.

Thank you for standing with us.
